name: CubeRush
description:
Cubevade Version 0.5

Cubevade!! is a small/short game for now, that is currently in development (Pre-Beta). This game is created by an Independent Developer that goes by the nickname Vorezii or by the real name Teevint Prak. The game is about you as a player, a cube moving towards a straight platform and dodging or evading the red obstacles. Yes I'll make a more interesting story but this is it for now. still in Pre-Beta. More things such as options menu and other interesting levels will be added. 

Credits: 

Powered By Unity 5D

Educated By Brackeys and my friend Ishan/Ithinker.

Music Provided By : Craze Music,Asset Store

VERSION 1.0!!!!(EndLess Level is unfortunately scraped).

SKIN CHANGER

SHOP SYSTEM

COIN SYSTEM

These 3 are the 3 things that sets my game different the one of brackeys. These functions is the one I put my upmost effort in.

Levels Organized and Fixed.

(There isn't much or any difference in graphics between low and high graphic option, So using lower graphic settings while playing is suggested.) Trust me, I made this game. 

(EndLess level, was too hard to make for my current knowledge and it is very computer heavy). My pc is I5 6400, RX 480 and 8Gb of ram. Soooooo.

Thanks you for 30 Downloads. The game is now 99% done.

Office computers can choose Medium and High and Ultra will be for good computers. "WARNING" endless level is very buggy on High and Ultra, even if you have a good PC. if you want to play endless get turn down the settings to medium and lower to protect yourself. Thank you for downloading. "Zip File"
